title: Storm Promoted to Washington Commanders Assistant Tight Ends Coach - michigantechhuskies.com
content: Storm Promoted to Washington Commanders Assistant Tight Ends Coach  michigantechhuskies.com
description: Former Michigan Tech defensive lineman Todd Storm has been promoted by the Washington Commanders football team to Assistant Tight Ends Coach. Storm, who hails from Laurium, Michigan, played four seasons at Michigan Tech (2008-11) where he recorded 140 career tackles with 18.5 sacks in 40 games.
